content: I have a conflict for a 6.100B microquiz that I would like to make you aware of.  I am on the basketball team, and we are departing for a game on November 9th before class even starts; therefore, I have to miss both lecture and the microquiz.  Could you let me know what the procedure will be like for taking that microquiz at an alternate time (will I take it earlier than everyone else or take it later that week)?   Thanks!
subject: 6.100B Microquiz Conflicts

content: Can you please send this over in an email? I'd like to have a record of this conversation off-piazza. Thanks!
